title: Sliding button

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sliding buttons are the individual pieces of the puzzle on the Reinitialisation Panel during Monkey Madness I. The actual buttons are items; however, they can only be seen in the puzzle interface and can never be obtained by players.

Sliding buttons are the individual pieces of the puzzle on the Reinitialisation Panel during Monkey Madness I. The actual buttons are items; however, they can only be seen in the puzzle interface and can never be obtained by players.

A second set of sliding buttons exists which can be seen in the Spare controls.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 January 2018
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Sliding button" to an entirely blank name.
  • The item's examine was changed from "A piece of the puzzle" to an entirely blank examine.
  • The "Move" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.

'''Sliding buttons''' are the individual pieces of the puzzle on the [[Reinitialisation Panel]] during [[Monkey Madness I]]. The actual buttons are items; however, they can only be seen in the puzzle interface and can never be obtained by players.

A second set of sliding buttons exists which can be seen in the [[Spare controls]].

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 11 January 2018
|update = The Return of Galvek
|change =
*The item was renamed from "Sliding button" to an entirely blank name.
*The item's examine was changed from "A piece of the puzzle" to an entirely blank examine.
*The "Move" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}
